definition: Li Kui, character in the novel Water Margin 水滸全傳|水浒全传[Shui3 hu3 quan2 zhuan4]
plum
surname Li

sentences.english: Li Kui after being labeled by the amnesty are Runzhou control.
sentences.chinese: 李逵受招安后被封为镇江润州都统制。

sentences.english: Introduced to the warden wearing a Song Jiang Kui.
sentences.chinese: 戴监狱长把李逵引见给了宋江。

sentences.english: Seeing that Li Kui did not believe him, Song Jiang asked him to search his house.
sentences.chinese: 眼看李逵不相信他，宋江问他搜索自己的家。

sentences.english: But awake, it should be said Li Kui is a trustworthy person.
sentences.chinese: 但清醒时，应该说李逵是一个值得信任的人。

sentences.english: Those who wear big beard is not certain it is Li Kui, still have pull ascend.
sentences.chinese: 留大胡子的不一定是李逵，还有拉登。

sentences.english: Wielding a pair of hatchets, Li Kui rushed in.
sentences.chinese: 李逵把板斧一挥，冲了出来。

sentences.english: Li Kui also reprove a pass, which made Big Brother look like.
sentences.chinese: 同时还数落了李逵一通，哪像个作大哥的样子。

sentences.english: In which Chinese classical novel is Li Kui, nicknamed "The Black Whirlwind", a character?
sentences.chinese: “黑旋风”李逵是哪部中国古典小说中的人物？

sentences.english: Water Margin is very interesting description of the preceding paragraphs, highlighting the true nature of Li Kui's thugs.
sentences.chinese: 水浒上几段描写很有意思，凸现李逵的打手本色。

sentences.english: Li Kui told them what he had heard, which song Jiang strongly denied.
sentences.chinese: 李逵告诉他们他所听到的，这宋江坚决否认。

sentences.english: Axes in hand, Li Kui charged across the hall towards Song Jiang.
sentences.chinese: 手斧，李逵被控向宋江整个大厅。

sentences.english: Which Chinese classical novel is the character Li Kui, nicknamed "black tornado", from?
sentences.chinese: “黑旋风”李逵是哪部中国古典小说中的人物？

sentences.english: No wonder the sight of Li Kui Song Jiang to be a dead set with Song Jiang.
sentences.chinese: 难怪李逵一见到宋江就死心塌地的跟定了宋江。
